00039 #ifndef ORO_OPERATIONBASE_HPP_
00040 #define ORO_OPERATIONBASE_HPP_
00041 
00042 #include "../rtt-config.h"
00043 #include "../rtt-fwd.hpp"
00044 #include "rtt-base-fwd.hpp"
00045 #include <string>
00046 #include <vector>
00047 #include "DisposableInterface.hpp"
00048 
00049 namespace RTT
00050 {
00051     template<class T>
00052     class Operation;
00053 
00058     enum ExecutionThread { OwnThread, ClientThread };
00059 
00060     namespace base
00061     {
00066         class OperationBase
00067         {
00068         protected:
00069             std::string mname;
00070             std::vector<std::string> descriptions;
00071             ExecutionEngine* mowner;
00072             RTT_API void mdoc(const std::string& description);
00073             RTT_API void marg(const std::string& name, const std::string& description);
00074             virtual void ownerUpdated() = 0;
00075         public:
00076             RTT_API OperationBase(const std::string& name);
00077             RTT_API virtual ~OperationBase();
00078 
00083             const std::string& getName() { return mname; }
00084 
00092             const std::vector<std::string>& getDescriptions() { return descriptions; }
00093 
00098             virtual DisposableInterface::shared_ptr getImplementation() = 0;
00099 
00100             virtual const DisposableInterface::shared_ptr getImplementation() const = 0;
00101 
00107             bool ready() const {
00108                 return mowner && getImplementation();
00109             }
00110 
00115             void setOwner(ExecutionEngine* ee) {
00116                 mowner = ee;
00117                 // inform Operation<T> to update the implementation.
00118                 this->ownerUpdated();
00119             }
00120         };
00121     }
00122 }
00123 
00124 #endif /* ORO_OPERATIONBASE_HPP_ */
